oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The whole proceedings on the trial of an information exhibited ex officio by the King's Attorney-General against Thomas Paine: for a libel upon the Revolution and settlement of the Crown and regal government as by law established; ... Tried by a special jury in the Court of King's Bench, Guildhall, on Tuesday, the 18th of December, 1792. ... Taken in short-hand by Joseph Gurney.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Paine, Thomas, 1737-1809.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: text_and_corpus_linguistics
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Oxford Text Archive, University of Oxford
